attributes.action: To make it compulsory for the Under 5's to wear corsets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a known medical fact in the Uk that most under fives are now obese or the size of small elephants.  Therefore, it would make perfect sense to make it compulsary for under 5's to wear a wale bone corset, thus creating a better posture and slender look!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
